comment: NeuroSphere Orchestrator Configuration - Non-sensitive settings only
comment_security: API keys and secrets are stored in environment variables for security
llm_description: OpenAI Realtime API model for WebSocket-based speech-to-speech audio conversations.
realtime_model_description: OpenAI Realtime API model (GA Aug 2025) for WebSocket-based speech-to-speech audio conversations.
ai_memory_description: Local AI-Memory service (FastAPI + Postgres/pgvector). Stores and retrieves long-term memory objects.
server_description: Public orchestrator endpoint (FastAPI) hosted on DigitalOcean. Twilio webhooks use this to deliver calls into the AI system.
embed_dim_description: Vector embedding dimension used for AI-Memory (pgvector). Must match DB schema.
port_description: Internal port where FastAPI orchestrator runs before being proxied by Nginx.
log_level_description: Logging verbosity level for orchestrator processes.
elevenlabs_description: Voice ID for ElevenLabs text-to-speech. Uses admin: pointer to fetch from ai-memory admin panel.
openai_voice_description: OpenAI Realtime API voice (alloy, echo, shimmer). Uses admin: pointer to fetch from ai-memory admin panel.
twilio_description: Your Twilio dev line. Calls to this number are routed into the orchestrator at SERVER_URL.
hot_reload_description: Whether the orchestrator should watch config.json for changes and reload automatically.
config_reload_interval_description: Interval (in seconds) for checking config.json updates if hot reload is enabled.
environment_description: Specifies the current environment (e.g., development, staging, production).
version_description: Semantic version of this configuration file. Increment whenever config.json changes.
last_updated_description: Date this configuration file was last updated.
admin_settings_description: Settings prefixed with 'admin:' are fetched from ai-memory service admin panel in real-time
